description: Mock historical traffic patterns for RATMS. These profiles can be extended with real traffic data in the future.

profiles.name: morning_rush
profiles.description: Morning rush hour (7-9 AM) - Heavy commuter traffic

profiles.name: midday
profiles.description: Midday traffic (10 AM - 4 PM) - Normal flow

profiles.name: evening_rush
profiles.description: Evening rush hour (5-7 PM) - Peak commuter traffic

profiles.name: night
profiles.description: Night traffic (11 PM - 6 AM) - Minimal activity

profiles.name: weekend_day
profiles.description: Weekend daytime (9 AM - 6 PM) - Leisure traffic

characteristics.note: Shopping and leisure patterns differ from weekday

notes.dataSource: Mock data based on typical urban traffic patterns
notes.futureIntegration: This file format supports integration with real traffic data from sources like Google Traffic API, TomTom, or municipal traffic sensors
notes.customization: Rate multipliers can be adjusted based on local traffic studies
